actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for a trial work period in disability situations similar to that provided under the social security system.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for continued receipt of disability benefits during a trial work period similar to that provided under the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for a trial work period in disability situations similar to that provided under the social security system.
